entry.def: Skis are long, flat, narrow pieces of wood, metal, or plastic that are fastened to boots so that you can move easily on snow or water.
When people ski, they move over snow or water on skis.

example.ex: The whole party then skied off.
example.tran: 然后整群人都滑着雪离去。
